channel.title: ZuneHD Gameboy Emulator
channel.description:
A ZuneHD gameboy emulator came out recently. It currently only supports gameboy color and doesn't have audio, but those will be added in future updates. Here is an article on it: [url='https://www.engadget.com/2010/05/11/visual-boy-zune-brings-game-boy-emulation-to-zune-hd-video/']ZuneHD Visual Boy[/url]
Also, there is no jailbreaking or device modding required. Simply install some programs on your computer and then run the installation.
And ipodfags, this is a thread for talking about the emulator, not bashing Zunes, go somewhere else if you want to do that.

Awsm. now that the ZDK is out in the open there should be some awesome stuff coming down the wire in the next few months.
